name: Escape from dinosaur island
description: RPG act adventure leisure game player plays a super boy who lives in the age of science and technology. In a flight mission, he crossed the dinosaur Volcano Island 65 million years ago, After a day and night , he successfully escaped from the Dinosaur Island. This game is developed for children's love of dinosaur theme. Parents and children can operate the keyboard, mouse and handle at the same time to play the parent-child effect.
